Name: Space Scumbags
About the game: Space Scumbags is a space shooter inspired by old school space shooter games like Galactix. Fight your way through waves of enemies and battle powerful bosses. Choose between 2 game modes Arcade - contains 100 pre designed waves of enemies Random - enemy shooting patterns are randomly generated and every play through will be different!
